verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: love] [ARG1: my commute] [ARGM-MNR: partially] [ARGM-CAU: in response to recent stories about how commutes can be polluted and breeding grounds for germs] a writer lists several things she likes about her own daily subway commute
